entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Castlegar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:14 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Castlegar Airport 5:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of snow. High minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
